markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Nilak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2375)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Nilak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2375)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 14</row>

**Perception** +19

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
chieftain's necklace worth 50 gp, [Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), _+1 [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (5 arrows)_, [rare candles and incense worth 100 gp suitable for use in a call spirit ritual](/Equipment.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +19 

+1 status to saves vs. poison
</row>

**HP** 160

**Resistances**
poison 4

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +16,
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite shortbow_ +16 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 28, attack +19
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283)
- **2nd**
[Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269)
- **4th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312), [Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=373)
- **5th**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364)

**Druid Order Spells, 1 Focus Point** DC 28
- **4th**
[Wild Morph](/Spells.aspx?ID=480), [Wild Shape](/Spells.aspx?ID=481)

**Rituals** DC 28

- **5th**
[Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5)

**Form Control**  ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) If Nilak's next action is to cast _wild shape_, _wild shape's_ spell level is 2 lower than normal but she remains transformed for up to 1 hour. She can still Dismiss the form at any time.

**Reach Spell** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) If the next action Nilak takes is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet.

**Wild Shape**   Nilak adds the forms _insect form_ and [_dinosaur form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=72) to her wild shape list.

</column>
name: Nilak
